title: The Adventures of Captain Mike
description: Michael Browning is the owner and Captain of the Princess, a 72 foot luxury Motor Yacht. He is 6' 2" and tanned with dark blonde hair and grey eyes.These six short erotic stories follow him on his voyage around the Mediterranean and around the various women in his life.Please note that this book contains adult themes of a sexual nature and is only suitable for readers of at least 18 years of age.
author: J.L. Vert
